attributes.action: Stop ALL foreign aid payments and put OUR money into fixing OUR country.
attributes.additional_details: Only a TRAITOR will ignore the plight of the people of this country while handing out OUR money to foreign despots so they can stay in power and use the money to kill innocent civilians through the international terrorism they perpetrate using money YOU give them. If you don't stop doing that Mr Cameron, this will be the final nail in your coffin. You WILL be placed on trial, at some time in the future, on a charge of treason.  That is an undertaking the people of this land WILL NOT renege upon, unlike you who has kept only one promise throughout your tenure and that was to succour foreign murderers and to fund their activity worldwide on any and all occasions rather than look after your own people.
